title.narrative: Service Provider for Transforming Education in Pakistan

description.narrative: This is an advocacy campaign to improve education in Pakistan, run as Alif Ailaan - http://www.alifailaan.pk/. Alif Ailaan is a Pakistani alliance for education reform. The project is scheduled to run until January 2016 and is worth £10.8 million.

sector.narrative: Education sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to education ministries, administration and management systems; institution capacity building and advice; school management and governance; curriculum and materials development; unspecified education activities
Formal and non-formal primary education for children; all elementary and first cycle systematic instruction; provision of learning materials
Research and studies on education effectiveness, relevance and quality; systematic evaluation and monitoring
Second cycle systematic instruction at both junior and senior levels
